title: Third Coast Spice Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Organic, Juice bar, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegan items clearly marked on menu, including in-house-made oatmeal, fusion burrito and Moroccan lentil burrito. Gluten-free bread available. Drinks include smoothies, soy lattes, juices. Offers soy mozzarella for make-your-own scrambles and griddle sandwiches. Uses eco-friendly disposables.
